name: selenium_dynamic_scraping
description: Scrape JavaScript-rendered content with Selenium headless

args: from selenium import webdriver; from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options; from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By; options = Options(); options.add_argument('--headless'); driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=options); driver.get('https://example.com'); title = driver.title; heading = driver.find_element(By.TAG_NAME, 'h1').text; print(f'Title: {title}'); print(f'Heading: {heading}'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Title: Example Domain
Heading: Example Domain

Dynamic content scraped

args: from selenium import webdriver; from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options; from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By; from selenium.webdriver.support.ui import WebDriverWait; from selenium.webdriver.support import expected_conditions as EC; options = Options(); options.add_argument('--headless'); driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=options); driver.get('https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/dynamic_loading/2'); driver.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, '#start button').click(); element = WebDriverWait(driver, 10).until(EC.visibility_of_element_located((By.CSS_SELECTOR, '#finish h4'))); print(f'Loaded text: {element.text}'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Loaded text: Hello World!

AJAX content waited and scraped

args: from selenium import webdriver; from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options; from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By; import time; options = Options(); options.add_argument('--headless'); driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=options); driver.get('https://example.com'); for i in range(3): driver.execute_script('window.scrollBy(0, 500)'); time.sleep(0.5); height = driver.execute_script('return document.body.scrollHeight'); print(f'Page height: {height}px'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Page height: 1500px

Page scrolled for lazy-load content
